testcase.classname: user must be create new account
testcase.name: user register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to register page........................................passed And user choose male or female..............................................passed When user enter valid data..................................................passed Then user click on register button..........................................passed And user Register Successfully..............................................passed

testcase.name: user login with valid data
testcase.system-out: When user navigate to login page............................................passed And user enter "ramorionly96@gmail.com" and "Password"......................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed And user login successfully and go to home page.............................passed

testcase.name: user login with invalid data

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Wrong Message expected [Login was unsuccessful. Please correct the errors and try again. The credentials provided are incorrect] but found [Login was unsuccessful. Please correct the errors and try again. No customer account found]

testcase.failure:
When user navigate to login page............................................passed And user enter "ramorionly@gmail.com" and "Passwordddd".....................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed And user not login successfully and go to home page.........................failed

The credentials provided are incorrect] but found [Login was unsuccessful. Please correct the errors and try again.
